ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: The lvl 35+ undead pop up during the night hours. Verant had implemented this for Halloween, but the response from all the players over lvl 30 was so positive
ygData.messageBody:
The lvl 35+ undead pop up during the night hours. Verant had implemented
this for Halloween, but the response from all the players over lvl 30 was so
positive they decided to let it stay. So during the day it's clear, and at
night it is hell on Norrath. Awesome fun though =)

Oh and there is plenty to be scared of in Norrath, generally though we dont
have to be too worried just travelling around. It's good to be the bard =)

Haven't run into Grimfeather or Shadowed men yet. But even if they could
outrun a lower lvl bard, I doubt they could outrun a bard past lvl 40. Bard
speed is just sick at that point.

Dank McGillicuty


> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Hmm, my run thru Kith was in day time hours. What is in Kith for 30+? I
> thought the Invasion was a one time thing for the PoH debut.
>
> As for faster than anything in Norrath, have you raced Grimfeather lately?
> Granted he's not in Kith but he's faster than my MM drums. Also,
Shadowmen
> are faster as well - I have heard.
>
> What fun is it if you are not scared? (The whole game I mean.)
>
> Sylly
>
